name: Karman Cruisers
description: Karman Cruisers is a strategic, shot making, multiplayer racer, with a unique atmospheric theme. Players choose from a range of unique space ships all equipped with their own specials abilities to travese the shattered floating islands, and an offensive bomb to mess up your opponents. Turn based shooting adds strategy and planning to each shot. Be the first to the teleporter in the least amount of shots to be victorious!
